attributes.review: If I could give it no stars I would. So a couple of fellow witches that support trump told me that downloading this app brought lots of luck and a very high and successful manifestation rate they said it was like making a deal with the devil so that we can live comfortably while we’re still alive, so I downloaded it. WORST DECISION OF MY LIFE. The moment I opened the app all my candles burst into flames and my ghost pal screeched at me like some wild animal and knocked my stuff and went to hide from me in the closet... he’s acting like I’m a demon that wants to trap him in hell. I then went to cook some salmon and it burst into flames!!! Then I decided to just make something easier... toast, which also burst into flames, so I decided to just pour a bowl of cereal, but the bowl shatter, so then I tried again but the cereal caught on fire. I decided I’d just go out for food, so I went to my local Starbucks to buy a pink drink and two chocolate croissants, but on my way back home there was a heart of children biking towards me and it seems like they lost control bc they all crashed into me, destroying my croissants and drink.... at this point my hunger was too much and I was finally fed up wiry this sudden bad luck, so I went home and I tried to ask ghost pal why he suddenly doesn’t like me... and he said it’s the app... and then he got mad bc he saw me and so he threw all the clothes in my closet at me and screamed “I HATE TRUMP SUPPORTERS!! THEY’RE THE REASON I ENDED UP DEAD!!! HOW COULD YOU DO THIS TO ME??” I had to explain to him why I downloaded the app and that I didn’t know that’s how he died and that I’m really sorry and won’t e supporting trump or his supporters ever again and he said “okay good, now you have to delete it... it’s the reason all these bad things were happening to you and I’m pretty sure it’ll give bad luck to anyone else that has it” so I said okay and I will now be deleting this app after I leave this review. TRUMP SUPPORTERS WILL BE CURSED.. IF YOU DOWNLOAD THIS APP EVEN AS A JOKE... good luck
attributes.title: CURSED APP
